p: In Mombasa, we specifically selected sites from around the city (Rabai-Kilifi) based on previous history of DENV-2 circulation [ 19]. In Kisumu and Nairobi, selection of sites was partly informed by logistical constraints, such as ease of access to homes. The study sites were Kanyakwar, Kajulu, and Nyalenda B in Kisumu and Githogoro in Nairobi ( Fig 1).
